[a] Suggest adding a definition of "just cause".

[b] Refer to the established legal tests since there is no standard definition - Look for language.

[c] Suggest adding a qualifier re: the burden of proof on the employer re: just cause.

[d] Recommendation to reorganize this article for the sake of clarity.

[e] Suggest clause re: employees' rights to be referred to by their self-identified gender pronouns.

[f] Strongly suggest explicit reference to sexual harassment and sexual solicitation or advances where there are power imbalances in work relationships.

[g] Recommendation to reformat as (g) "can be systemically related to policies, practices...."

[h] Suggestion to add a timeframe within which investigations need to be handled.

[i] Suggestion to add a timeframe, referencing 16.08

[j] Suggest rewording: "...the notice period and entry into the redeployment pool will begin when their entitled leave ends".

[k] Suggestion to reference a policy/criteria in (b) and (c).

[l] Suggestion to add vacation to (a).

[m] Suggestion to reword for flexibility: "Each employee whose workday consists of 7 hours or more is also entitled to two 15-minute breaks at appropriate times during the workday, preferably in the 1st and 2nd half of the workday."

[n] Suggestion to add criteria re: assessing the impact of such arrangements.

[o] Suggestion to clarify how overtime is tracked and made transparent to the employee.

[p] Suggestion to add additional days off to observe religious, cultural, or other holidays significant to the employee, e.g., "Employees are entitled to a total of three paid days off per calendar year to observe religious or cultural holidays of their choosing. Employees must notify their supervisor at least two weeks in advance of their intended leave date. The employer shall accommodate additional unpaid leave requests for religious, cultural, or other observances, provided such accommodations do not cause undue hardship to the organization."

[q] I'd recommend that this be added to the unity council package.

[r] Suggestion to include TRC Day here as well.

[s] Suggestion to define/qualify 'serious illness or accident'.

[t] Strongly suggest adding leave for gender-affirming care and reproductive health/well-being, and adding this to the unity council proposals so that all employees have this right.

[u] I'm happy to consult PAGGAS on this and the VPCEI office since we recently gave feedback on the workplace accommodations policy re: gender affirming care.

[v] Suggestion to reword for flexibility "... should be made at least 2 business days prior to the appointment wherever possible."

[w] Wording assumes all children have two parents. Suggestion to rephrase, "Where two employees are parents of the same child, they may choose to take Parental Leave concurrently or sequentially."

[x] Suggestion to clarify to make less discretionary, e.g., "In the event of unusual pregnancy or birth situations that may not align with the standard provisions of this Article, employees may request a review of their circumstances. Such requests may include relevant medical or personal documentation. Human Resources, in consultation with the employee and their supervisor, will evaluate the situation based on the following criteria: (a) Medical necessity for modified or extended leave; (b) family circumstances, such as family configurations or care responsibilities, that impact the application of standard leave provisions; and (c) the impact on employment, concerning how the situation affects the employee's ability to perform their job duties. The decision-making process will prioritize the employee's well-being and aim to provide accommodations that align with the organization's commitment to fair and equitable treatment. Decisions and justifications will be communicated to the employee in writing within <specified timeframe>."

[y] Suggestion to add supplementary health benefits with funding by the employer, administered by USW for reproductive health and gender-affirming care. See https://hr.mcmaster.ca/app/uploads/2019/02/Collective-Agreement-CUPE-3906-Unit-3-Postdocs.pdf

[z] Again, this would be a proposal to add to the unity council package.
